Big idea is sampling variability and how to deal with it

- Observations are noisy, backward-looking, incompletely measured, etc.
- Model-based estimates can explore unseen conditions but necessarily layer in model biases

The other technical challenge is that estimates of very rare events are necessarily hard to impossible to verify
